thread.title: IGP: Jong-nam murder suspects believed to have undergone training
thread.title_full: IGP: Jong-nam murder suspects believed to have undergone training

title: IGP: Jong-nam murder suspects believed to have undergone training
text:
The suspects identified in the killing of Kim Jong-nam are believed to have undergone training, revealed inspector-general of police Khalid Abu Bakar. 
Bernama quoted him as stating that the suspects, including two women, knew what they were doing. 
He added the two arrested women, holders of a Vietnamese and Indonesian passport respectively, were also aware that the liquid used to smother Jong-nam was toxic. 
Police are also looking for four North Korean suspects who are believed to have fled the country following the Feb 13 murder at the Kuala Lumpur International Airport (KLIA 2). 
[More to follow]
